about_the_game:
Can you handle the Genre-Bending Action? Take everything you know about Dot collecting games, then add Timed Puzzles, Obstacles, Enemy Types & Score Multipliers !

  • Navigate to avoid Enemies & Obstacles as you try to collect enough energy to help 'RoLL' escape. Learn the Twitch Control scheme to master the 'Drift & Snap' and 'Soft Corners' gameplay systems.

  • Add yourself to the HighScore ladder!

  • Use PowerUps to smash Enemies, dash out of danger & even blow up destructable walls that reveal hidden areas.

  • The Clock is ticking survive long enough to reach each of the 4 score multipliers. Faster clear times = a bigger Score Bonus!

Save this little Guy ! ! !
